critique: The document is an executive order amending a previous order regarding the processing of export license applications for commercial communication satellites and hot-section technologies for aircraft engines. It outlines the review and appeal processes within the government, specifically focusing on disagreements between departments and agencies. The order emphasizes the role of the Chair of the OC and the ACEP in resolving these disagreements, with a final appeal possible to the Secretary. The order also includes a clause stating that it does not create any rights to administrative or judicial review.
